articles.description: The James Webb Space Telescope has discovered a completely new class of exoplanet. This discovery could reshape existing planetary classifications.
articles.content: Out of over 5,500 confirmed exoplanets, many are significantly different from planets in our Solar System. However, the thick atmospheric clouds have made it difficult to determine the composition of… [+14 chars]

articles.title: Hula-hooping robots reveal the physics behind keeping rings aloft - Science News Magazine
articles.description: The gyrations of hoop-slinging robots reveal that hourglass-shaped objects are best at keeping a hoop in the air.
articles.content:
To keep a Hula-Hoop aloft, it helps to be in shape literally.
Experiments with gyrating, hoop-slinging robots have revealed how these spinning rings stay up despite the pull of gravity. The shape of… [+2014 chars]
